Although he hadn't passed the graduation exam, Mizuki-sensei had given him another opportunity to graduate to a genin, which was the bring him this Scroll of Forbidden, er, Forbiddenness, yeah, that sounded right! "Let's see... first one up... Shadow Clone Jutsu... Oh crap..."
